name: Get That Dollar
description:
CONTENT WARNING:

Inflammatory anti-capitalist left wing rhetoric, ASCII gore of both the human and the animal variety, swearing, melancholy.

Slight naughtiness.

Get That Dollar is a HYPER LOW RES SUPER RETRO children's TV show fanfic/anti-capitalist screed co-authored with an AI! Made in Epic's first project, the 1991 text-based game engine ZZT!

It was made for Oktrollberfest 2022. It's a troll game. What's that? "a troll game is a game that sets up and subverts expectations.  The best troll games are ones where the player can follow the logic of the game, but that doesn't stop them from walking into the game's traps."

-Features

*Transform into a chicken
*Hack an ATM
*Do math with Barney the dinosaur!
*Perform unlicensed dentistry!
*I forget how many endings, but at least three!

-How do I do this?

When you start the game, it will take you to a menu where you can restore saved games with R or just hit P to play.

Arrow keys walk around, shift + arrow shoots, arrows to pick menu options and enter to select them. That's about it.

Credits:

Writing, Art, Music, Coding: Jeremy W. Kaufmann

Animated Gifs: KKairos

Testing: Pogesoft, BobPragt

Tools: Zeta, Zima, OpenZoo by Asie, Zedit2 by Lancer-X, Weave by WiL, Fuse and Mixamo by Adobe, Blender by Blender Foundation, ZZT by Tim Sweeney, Midjourney by Midjourney, Lex by Every.

Yes, I made 3D models to create ascii graphics.

-What's it run on?-

Minimum specs: This will run on basically any computer that supports HTML5 and if you do the downloadable version, basically anything at all. This is using the Weave 2.8b fork of ZZT.

-Jeremy W. Kaufmann 

Oct 31st, 2022
